PackageOracle.name: DA_SERVICE_ORDER_EVENT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SERVICE_ORDER_EVENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.16.701431000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_submitted_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_required_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_completed_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_status IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_submitted_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_required_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_completed_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_status IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,service_order_submitted_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_required_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_completed_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_status IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_service_order_event;

body.name: DA_SERVICE_ORDER_EVENT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SERVICE_ORDER_EVENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.16.714008000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_submitted_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_required_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_completed_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_status IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_order_event.add(fx), parms=' || service_order_submitted_dttm || '|' || service_order_required_dttm || '|' || service_order_completed_dttm || '|' || service_order_status || '|' || service_order_completion_cd || '|' || service_order_reason_cd || '|' || party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_service_order_event a
(
a.service_order_event_id
,a.service_order_submitted_dttm
,a.service_order_required_dttm
,a.service_order_completed_dttm
,a.service_order_status
,a.service_order_completion_cd
,a.service_order_reason_cd
,a.party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_service_order_event_id.NEXTVAL
,add.service_order_submitted_dttm
,add.service_order_required_dttm
,add.service_order_completed_dttm
,add.service_order_status
,add.service_order_completion_cd
,add.service_order_reason_cd
,add.party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.service_order_event_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_order_event.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_submitted_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_required_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_completed_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_status IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_order_event.add, parms=' || service_order_submitted_dttm || '|' || service_order_required_dttm || '|' || service_order_completed_dttm || '|' || service_order_status || '|' || service_order_completion_cd || '|' || service_order_reason_cd || '|' || party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_service_order_event a
(
a.service_order_event_id
,a.service_order_submitted_dttm
,a.service_order_required_dttm
,a.service_order_completed_dttm
,a.service_order_status
,a.service_order_completion_cd
,a.service_order_reason_cd
,a.party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_service_order_event_id.NEXTVAL
,add.service_order_submitted_dttm
,add.service_order_required_dttm
,add.service_order_completed_dttm
,add.service_order_status
,add.service_order_completion_cd
,add.service_order_reason_cd
,add.party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_order_event.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,service_order_submitted_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_required_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_completed_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,service_order_status IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_order_event.add, parms=' || service_order_event_id || '|' || service_order_submitted_dttm || '|' || service_order_required_dttm || '|' || service_order_completed_dttm || '|' || service_order_status || '|' || service_order_completion_cd || '|' || service_order_reason_cd || '|' || party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_service_order_event a
(
a.service_order_event_id
,a.service_order_submitted_dttm
,a.service_order_required_dttm
,a.service_order_completed_dttm
,a.service_order_status
,a.service_order_completion_cd
,a.service_order_reason_cd
,a.party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.service_order_event_id
,add.service_order_submitted_dttm
,add.service_order_required_dttm
,add.service_order_completed_dttm
,add.service_order_status
,add.service_order_completion_cd
,add.service_order_reason_cd
,add.party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_order_event.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_order_event.del, parms=' || service_order_event_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_service_order_event a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.service_order_event_id = del.service_order_event_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_order_event.del');

END del;

END da_service_order_event;
